title: "AI Mania, Financials and Energy Stocks Boost Hedge Fund Gains"
excerpt: "Event-driven hedge funds, which include shareholder activism and those betting on mergers and acquisitions, led the industry performance in July, with 2.58% in gains. In the year, they are up 5.10%. Macro hedge funds, which struggled in March with the banking crisis, posted gains of 0.47% last month, but in the year they are still down 0.36%."
